changelog: QB framework functions updated to ensure 'source' is always a number.
Introduced client and server functions to retrieve online police count.
Added ability to connect images in place of skill icons.
Added tooltips added to the Skill Tree generator to clarify the purpose of each parameter.
Added new option to hide category visibility for specific users: Config.CategoryVisibilityHandler.
Added functionality to remove XP within the current level range without reducing the level.
Added server-side exports: removePoints and removeXp.
Added uI configuration to adjust sound volume and customize number formatting.
Added text formatting for XP numbers in the UI.
Added missing translations in the Skill Tree generator.
Added client-side export: closeSkillTree.
Added server-side export: getUnlockedSkills.
Added client-side export: getConfig.
Added new options in the generator for skill tree customization.
Added system to block unlocking of certain skills if another skill is unlocked.
Added additional animations in the UI, such as confetti upon unlocking a skill.
Added highlight color changed to the primary theme color.
Added summary of missed errors added during the save attempt in the generator.
Fixed cached keybind issue for opening the menu via keybind.
Fixed skill category selection centering in the top panel.
Fixed incorrectly displayed warning about duplicate UID in the generator when replacing a previously assigned UID.
Fixed issue where opening a new skill info window replaced information in an already open window.
Resolved an issue that was causing the Herbal Skill Tree to fail loading occasionally
Fixed sound not working in certain cases.
Improved rendering performance of various Skill Tree UI components.
Improved validation of already-used categories in the generator.
Improved validation of used UIDs, points, and skill effects.
Improved highlighting of skills with errors or missing required data in the generator.
Renamed parameters in exports and listeners for better intuitiveness.
Expanded README and documentation with numerous examples for using exports and listeners.
Updated resource name, exports, and listeners to align with new scripts for consistency.
[Old export and listener names will continue to work, so no changes are required in existing code. Script name changes in the CFG are also unnecessary.]

[All files should be replaced except configs/sh.skills.lua and configs/sh.main.lua. The remaining config files can be easily compared, and only the additions should be transferred. The updates are marked as 'update 2.0.0'.]
Added automatic system to synchronize cached client XP 2 minutes before a scheduled txAdmin restart.
Added client event 'devhub_skillTree:client:forceSyncOfCachedXp' to manually trigger synchronization of cached XP.
Two development commands added (commented out by default) in configs/s.main.lua: '/addXp [category] [amount]' and '/addPoints [category] [amount]'.
Commands are disabled by default due to lack of restriction checks and are intended only for development use until the next devhub_lib update adds proper security.
Fixed a bug where a player was not reverted to their original clothes after being removed from a group during work.
Integrated the script with the new sound system from devhub_lib.
Added Shared.SoundVolume to the config and volume to config.js.
Added a notification when a player is accepted into a group.
Renamed dh_miner to devhub_miner, no further action required.
Requires devhub_lib update to version 2.0.0.
Fixed an issue with the job ranking system not displaying or sorting correctly on some setups.
Removed the get_jobs_leaderboard SQL procedure due to compatibility issues with certain MariaDB versions
Fixed an issue with the job ranking system not displaying or sorting correctly on some setups.
Removed the get_jobs_leaderboard SQL procedure due to compatibility issues with certain MariaDB versions
New config option Config.UseRKLSpellManager added, enabling integration with the RKL Spell Manager system.
Improved validation when loading saved skills to prevent potential errors or inconsistencies.
Improved overall script security to prevent unauthorized access and potential exploits.
Handler support added for each multi-recipe, allowing custom logic execution per recipe.
Adjusted minigame 4 difficulty, which became unintentionally too hard to complete after the last update.
Fixed an issue with the job ranking system not displaying or sorting correctly on some setups.
Removed the get_jobs_leaderboard SQL procedure due to compatibility issues with certain MariaDB versions
Error 'ERR_REQUEST_RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE' caused by the default .ogg music file has been fixed.
Default .ogg music file replaced with a .mp3 version (different song).
User sound volume is now saved in local storage, so users only need to set it once.
Initial release
Initial release
Documentation comments added in the config file explaining all available methods to open the guidebook.
Export function added to open the guidebook from other scripts: exports["devhub_guidebook"].openGuideBook().

New client event to open the guidebook:
- From client-side: TriggerEvent("dh_guidebook:client:openGuideBook")
- From server-side: TriggerClientEvent("dh_guidebook:client:openGuideBook", source)
Command and keybind registration now only occurs when Config.OpenGuideBook.command is not nil.
Config.OpenGuideBook.command can now be set to nil to fully disable command registration.
Initial release
Resolved an issue in Minigame 7 that allowed players to complete the minigame earlier than intended.
Resolved an issue in the crime trader's shop where attempting to purchase a non-level 1 item from the 'All' tab would result in an 'Item not found' message.
Fixed a bug where the crime trader's app status would reset after completing a job, triggering a false premium content notification.
Unnecessary console logs have been removed from the UI for cleaner debugging.
Improved overall script security to ensure more robust and reliable protection against exploits.
Resolved an issue where the airdrop occasionally spawned underground due to incorrect position calculations.
Lockpick configuration added in shared.lua:
Shared.Lockpick.enabled to enable/disable lockpick removal.
Shared.Lockpick.itemName to set a custom item name (default: 'lockpick').
Shared.Lockpick.removeOnFail to remove the item on failed attempts.
Shared.Lockpick.removeOnSuccess to remove the item on successful attempts.
Translation added in translation.lua: 'no_lockpick' message when the player has no lockpick.
Payout configuration added in server.lua:
Config.PayoutMethod to switch between 'default' and 'custom' payout.
Config.CustomPayout function to define custom payout logic (supports external events/scripts).
Added police count check before starting a robbery mission.
Disabled two logs that were causing server-side errors to improve stability.
Fixed UI debug elements that were always visible.
New file server.lua added in configs with GetCharacterUniqueId(source) function: allows each character to have separate radio names and settings.
StartRadioTalk() function added to configs/client.lua – triggers when player starts talking on radio.
StopRadioTalk() function added to configs/client.lua – triggers when player stops talking on radio.
CanPlayerTalkOnRadio() function added to configs/client.lua – checks if player is allowed to talk on the radio.
CanConnectToRadio() function added to configs/client.lua – checks if player can connect to the radio channel.
ForceDisconnect() client-side function introduced – forcibly disconnects player from radio when triggered.
